modName: Scout Armor - Black Leather-Dark Green clothes
summary: A blackened leather version for the Scout Armor by doodaboom
descriptionHtml:
My attempt in making a darker version of this truly amazing armor.
You can find the original version here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7109. 
Please take time to endorse. Doodaboom done a great work, I just edited for my own purpose.

This version includes:
- Black leather armor (Male and Female)
- Black leather quiver and scabbard
- Black leather boots (Male and Femae)
- Black leather gauntlets
- Dark bow

This is not a stand-alone version, it will replace the original scout armor.

[b]PLEASE, let me know if you would like to have some color variations[/b] (lore friendly, nothing about pink/fucsia leather etc), I\'ll be glad to try something new cause I like to play with photoshop :P
author: Gunvarian and doodaboom
